content: meet troy the t-rex troy may look fierce but he s actually incredibly gentle and sweet he loves pets and cuddles if you didn t know better you d think he was just a big puppy materials you need -worsted-weight yarn 4-ply in any color plus a small amount of black and white for the mouth and claws the u k equivalent is aran and aus/nz is 8 ply for the orange t-rex in the step-by-step photos i used hobby lobby s i love this yarn in the color burnt pumpkin and for the green t-rex i used the same brand in the color mid green -g 4 mm crochet hook -15 mm black safety eyes -fiberfill or your stuffing of choice -bent tip tapestry needle -scissors -stitch marker -straight pins abbreviation key abbreviations are in u s terms -single_crochet single_crochet -st/sts stitch es -slip_stitch slip_stitch -decrease decrease join the next 2 stitches together -increase increase 2 single_crochet in the next stitch -half_double_crochet half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet decrease half_double_crochet decrease -blo back loops only -r1 round 1 -repeat repeat -** repeat the group of instructions between the asterisks the number of times indicated note all rounds are worked continuously that is vs joined rounds
